item.title: What is astigmatism? Why does it make my vision blurry? And how did I get it?
item.description: Have you ever gone to the optometrist for an eye test and were told your eye was shaped like a football?

item.title: Five things to know about ultra-processed food

item.title: New research finds changing your diet could ease persistent headaches after brain injury
item.description: A new clinical trial demonstrates that dietary changes significantly reduce persistent post-traumatic headaches (pPTH), a common and debilitating cons...

item.title: AI can identify hidden heart valve defects from a patient's EKG
item.description: An AI algorithm could help to predict which patients might develop significant heart problems years in advance, just based on EKG readings.

item.title: RFK Jr. fires two Trump-appointed senior officials in ongoing HHS restructuring
item.description: U.S. Health and Human Services (HHS) Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. has removed two senior officials who were appointed by President Donald Trump.
